constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 141 (Friday, August 6, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MOOLENAAR:
H.R. 4968.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 1: The Congress shall have
Power To lay and collect Taxes, Duties, Imposts and Excises,
to pay the Debts and provide for the common Defence and
general Welfare of the United States; but all Duties, Imposts
and Excises shall be uniform throughout the United States;
[Page H4321]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: Stop COVID Bonuses for Elected Officials Act
